notes: Only the attack range bonus is limited to ranged attacks. Melee attacks only apply the damage.

The bonus damage is dealt in one instance together with the attack damage, and counts as attack damage as well. It can be lifestealed off of, but it is not considered by crit or cleave. It is also not affected by percentage-based attack damage bonuses or reductions, but can be reduced with flat reductions.
Triggers against any attack target, but the damage is not applied if the target is a building.
Multiple instances of Certain Strike fully stack.
abilities.description: Empowers your next Ranged Attack with +400 bonus range, 270 bonus magical damage and True Strike.
